OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS

Mr. Herbert Goldhor
Chief librarian

22 Southeast 5th Street
Evansville, Indiana
Dear Mr* Goldhor*
I am sorry to inform you that the HAEB Board of Directors did not approve
your application for membership in our association*
The Evansville *ublic library does not meet our requirement for either an
active or associate member•
However, you, yourself, may apply for an affiliate membership* %is cate¬
gory is for individuals who are interested in educational broadcasting and
who wish to b© kept informed of progress*
Sincerely,
Harry J* Skornia
